content: समवस्था {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To remain fixed, stand immoveable; stand still. {@--2@} To stand ready. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To establish, found. {@--2@} To stop.
समवस्था {@--1@} Fixed condition. {@--2@} Similar condition or state; <ls>Ś. 4.</ls> {@--3@} State or condition in general; <ls>R. 19. 50</ls>; <ls>M. 4. 7.</ls>
